post_title: WTT: my HOF 2’s for your 1’s or raws
post_content:
I’m about to crack some HOFers for my T206 binder set but before I did so, wanted to see if anyone was interested in trading up for some 2s. For my binder, I’m fine with presentable 1’s, and obviously raw cards as well. 

If you have any of these HOFers in PSA or SGC 1s, or raw, and would like to trade up to a 2, let me know. 

Would love to do my 2 for your lower grade of the same card (plus t206 commons to even out the value). Let me know if you are interested.  What I have and want to downgrade:

John McGraw (glove at hip), Polar Bear, PSA 2.5
Hugh Duffy, Sov 460, PSA 2
Frank Chance (yellow), Tolstoi, PSA 2
Johnny Evers (portrait), Pied 350, PSA 2
Home Run Baker, Pied 350, PSA 2
Jack Chesbro, Pied 150, PSA 2
George Davis, Sweet Cap 150/649 OP, PSA 2
Fred Clarke (holding bat), Sweet Cap 150/30 PSA 2
Vic Willis (portrait), Pied 350, SGC 2
Clark Griffith (batting), Sweet Cap 350-460/25, SGC 2
